actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: Concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1976, and directing certain reconciliation action.

summary.text: Revises the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 1976, including to recommend a budget deficit of $0 and a public debt of $548,400,000,000, and to prescribe the appropriate levels for budget authority, budget outlays, and Federal revenues.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution revising the congressional budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1976, and directing certain reconciliation action.
